p: Finally, micronutrients and food compounds with other additional biological activities could be of interest for addressing other concerns related to COVID-19. For instance, vitamin E, garlic, selenium, fish oil, ginkgo biloba, ginger, and ginseng, all of which have anticoagulant activity [ 57, 58], could be proposed as adjuvants in the thrombotic events that have been recently clinically correlated with SARS-CoV-2 disease progression in a high percentage of patients [ 59, 60].
